text: Mobs, Inc. is a 1956 film directed by William Asher. It stars Reed Hadley and Lisa Howard.http://allmovie.com/work/mobs-inc-102618 It was composed of three episodes from the American television series Racket Squad. ==Cast== *Reed Hadley as Capt. John Braddock *Lisa Howard as Ronnie Miles *Marjorie Reynolds as Mary Hale Browne *Douglass Dumbrille as Leland Cameron James ==See also== *List of American films of 1956 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1956 films Category:Films directed by William Asher Category:1956 crime films Category:American crime films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:English-language films Category:Film noir
title: Mobs, Inc.
